description: [Winter Vivern](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G1035) registered and hosted domains to allow for creation of web pages mimicking legitimate government email logon sites to collect logon information.(Citation: SentinelOne WinterVivern 2023)

external_references.description: Tom Hegel. (2023, March 16). Winter Vivern | Uncovering a Wave of Global Espionage. Retrieved July 29, 2024.
